data.message: Coca-Cola, why do you only give us cherry flavour widespread in the UK for coke drinks. Why can't we have all the different flavours that your Freestyle machines offer bottled up?

replies.message: Hi Oliver, we work locally, tailoring our drinks to local tastes. Some Coca-Cola Freestyle combinations are more popular than others. We recently launched Coca-Cola Vanilla with Zero Sugar due to the popularity of this combination in Coca-Cola Freestyle. There are no current plans to introduce any more Coca-Cola Freestyle flavours to general distribution at the moment but we'll pass your feedback onto our team.
Shame - I miss the days when you provided Diet Coke Vanilla in bottles...
I miss coke with lemon .. then again I just could by coke and add my own lemon
Hi Oliver, Unfortunately there's no plans to bring Diet Coke with Vanilla to GB. However I'll be sure to pass your comments to our brand team! Thanks
Coca-Cola btw Pepsi doesn't make Diet Pepsi vanilla anymore
